PService.wsdlXml:
<wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://hugh:8081/axis/services/PlayerStats" xmlns:apachesoap="http://xml.apache.org/xml-soap" xmlns:impl="http://hugh:8081/axis/services/PlayerStats" xmlns:intf="http://hugh:8081/axis/services/PlayerStats" xmlns:tns1="http://playerstatsws.test.l7tech.com" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:wsdlsoap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <!--WSDL created by Apache Axis version: 1.3 Built on Oct 05, 2005 (05:23:37 EDT)--> <wsdl:types> <schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://playerstatsws.test.l7tech.com" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <element name="getPhysicalStats"> <complexType> <sequence> <element name="playerNumber" type="xsd:int"/> <element name="delay" type="xsd:int"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="getPhysicalStatsResponse"> <complexType> <sequence> <element name="getPhysicalStatsReturn" type="tns1:PhysicalStats"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <complexType name="PhysicalStats"> <sequence> <element name="height" nillable="true" type="xsd:string"/> <element name="position" nillable="true" type="xsd:string"/> <element name="shoots" nillable="true" type="xsd:string"/> <element name="weight" type="xsd:int"/> </sequence> </complexType> <element name="getOffensiveStats"> <complexType> <sequence> <element name="playerNumber" type="xsd:int"/> <element name="delay" type="xsd:int"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="getOffensiveStatsResponse"> <complexType> <sequence> <element name="getOffensiveStatsReturn" type="tns1:OffensiveStats"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <complexType name="OffensiveStats"> <sequence> <element name="assists" type="xsd:int"/> <element name="gamesPlayed" type="xsd:int"/> <element name="goals" type="xsd:int"/> <element name="penaltyMins" type="xsd:int"/> <element name="plusMinus" type="xsd:int"/> <element name="points" type="xsd:int"/> </sequence> </complexType> <element name="listPlayers"> <complexType> <sequence> <element name="delay" type="xsd:int"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="listPlayersResponse"> <complexType> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="listPlayersReturn" type="tns1:Player"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <complexType name="DraftDetails"> <sequence> <element name="pick" type="xsd:int"/> <element name="round" type="xsd:int"/> <element name="team" nillable="true" type="xsd:string"/> <element name="year" type="xsd:int"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="Player"> <sequence> <element name="FName" nillable="true" type="xsd:string"/> <element name="LName" nillable="true" type="xsd:string"/> <element name="age" type="xsd:int"/> <element name="dob" nillable="true" type="xsd:string"/> <element name="draftDetails" nillable="true" type="tns1:DraftDetails"/> <element name="number" type="xsd:int"/> <element name="offensiveStats" nillable="true" type="tns1:OffensiveStats"/> <element name="physicalStats" nillable="true" type="tns1:PhysicalStats"/> </sequence> </complexType> <element name="getDraftDetails"> <complexType> <sequence> <element name="playerNumber" type="xsd:int"/> <element name="delay" type="xsd:int"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="getDraftDetailsResponse"> <complexType> <sequence> <element name="getDraftDetailsReturn" type="tns1:DraftDetails"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="getPlayer"> <complexType> <sequence> <element name="playerNumber" type="xsd:int"/> <element name="delay" type="xsd:int"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="getPlayerResponse"> <complexType> <sequence> <element name="getPlayerReturn" type="tns1:Player"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="addPlayer"> <complexType> <sequence> <element name="player" type="tns1:Player"/> <element name="delay" type="xsd:int"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="addPlayerResponse"> <complexType> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="addPlayerReturn" type="tns1:Player"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="removePlayer"> <complexType> <sequence> <element name="playerNumber" type="xsd:int"/> <element name="delay" type="xsd:int"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="removePlayerResponse"> <complexType> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="removePlayerReturn" type="tns1:Player"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> </schema> </wsdl:types>
<wsdl:message name="getPhysicalStatsRequest">
<wsdl:part element="tns1:getPhysicalStats" name="parameters"/>
</wsdl:message>
<wsdl:message name="addPlayerResponse">
<wsdl:part element="tns1:addPlayerResponse" name="parameters"/>
</wsdl:message>
<wsdl:message name="addPlayerRequest">
<wsdl:part element="tns1:addPlayer" name="parameters"/>
</wsdl:message>
<wsdl:message name="getOffensiveStatsResponse">
<wsdl:part element="tns1:getOffensiveStatsResponse" name="parameters"/>
</wsdl:message>
<wsdl:message name="removePlayerResponse">
<wsdl:part element="tns1:removePlayerResponse" name="parameters"/>
</wsdl:message>
<wsdl:message name="listPlayersRequest">
<wsdl:part element="tns1:listPlayers" name="parameters"/>
</wsdl:message>
<wsdl:message name="listPlayersResponse">
<wsdl:part element="tns1:listPlayersResponse" name="parameters"/>
</wsdl:message>
<wsdl:message name="getDraftDetailsRequest">

</wsdl:message>

</wsdl:message>

</wsdl:message>
<wsdl:message name="getPlayerResponse">

</wsdl:message>
<wsdl:message name="removePlayerRequest">
<wsdl:part element="tns1:removePlayer" name="parameters"/>
</wsdl:message>
<wsdl:message name="getPlayerRequest">

</wsdl:message>
<wsdl:portType name="PlayerStats">
<wsdl:operation name="getPhysicalStats">
<wsdl:input message="impl:getPhysicalStatsRequest" name="getPhysicalStatsRequest"/>
<wsdl:output message="impl:getPhysicalStatsResponse" name="getPhysicalStatsResponse"/>
</wsdl:operation>
<wsdl:operation name="getOffensiveStats">

<wsdl:output message="impl:getDraftDetailsResponse" name="getDraftDetailsResponse"/>
</wsdl:operation>

<wsdl:output message="impl:getPlayerResponse" name="getPlayerResponse"/>
</wsdl:operation>
<wsdl:operation name="addPlayer">
<wsdl:input message="impl:addPlayerRequest" name="addPlayerRequest"/>

</wsdl:operation>
<wsdl:operation name="removePlayer">

</wsdl:operation>
</wsdl:portType>
